channel.title: RuneLord Alpha [Better combat system, custom minigame, clipped npcs and more++ ]
channel.description:
Last update: 08-06-2012
[size=36pt][color=red]RuneLord Alpha[/COLOR]:[/size]
[size=24pt][B]Version: 1.00[/B][/size]
[size=24pt]Origninal base: Clean Delta[/size]
[size=24pt]This server was built mainly from scratch.[/size]
[size=20pt][b]The Team:[/b][/size]
[size=18pt]Staff:[/size]
[ul][img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20081127002261/runescape/images/archive/3/31/20091122095739!Jmod_crown.png[/img][list][li]Mark[/li][/list] [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20081127002261/runescape/images/archive/3/31/20091122095739!Jmod_crown.png[/img][list][li]Mike[/li][/list] [img]http://img184.imageshack.us/img184/6660/crown8hdtg5.gif[/img][list][li]Alex[/li] [/list]
[b]BETA Tester(s):[/b] [list] [li]Alex[/li] [/list]
[IMG]http://img256.imageshack.us/img256/3919/sconflictedcopy20120804.png[/img]
[size=18pt][B]Game completion: 40%[/B] - This will be updated.[/size]
[size=18pt][B]About Server:[/B][/size]
[size=20pt][u][b]I have started this project 2 weeks ago, and so far everything has been working out for me.. this server uses the old 2006 RuneScape client and has an auto-updating cache.[/b][/u][/size]
Skills:
Cooking - 0%
Herblore - 90%
Woodcutting - 90%
Fishing - 80%( need to add shark and manta ray spots )
Slayer - 40%
Crafting - 100%
[size=14pt][b]Gameframe:[/b][/size]
[size=18pt][font=arial black][b]Server Features:[/b][/font][/size]
[size=14pt]Added better combat system.
Clipped Npcs 100%
Clipped players 15%
Custom mini-game (invasion)
Fixed over 15 common delta glitches.
Auto updating cache.
Better skills system
100% player and Npc dialogue
Some mini-events and challanges
Hidden content ( easter eggs ) - 20% done
Better npc system.
Fixed syi's, some nulls and most glitches.
Fixed duping in every possible way found.
Auto-Saving character system.
Added frames ( camera movement and fading from black and lots more. )
Range following ( with arrow stacks )
Invasion - All glitches fixed..
Event Manager used for some skills[/size]
-THIS will be updated
[size=24pt]Media:[/size]
[IMG]http://img31.imageshack.us/img31/5867/pic10n.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/2822/pic9s.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img341.imageshack.us/img341/1383/pic8es.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img560.imageshack.us/img560/6444/pic6hm.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/6782/pic3aa.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/9158/pic7k.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/1463/pic5qq.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/6704/pic4wg.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/3715/pic1kx.png[/img]
[size=18pt][b]New alternate background, tell me which you think is better :)[/b][/size]
[img]http://img441.imageshack.us/img441/2479/newbackgroundk.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/8136/tutorialv.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/1604/questtab.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/6415/dclawsx.png[/img]
[size=18pt][b]UPDATE:[/b][/size][size=20pt][b]Added new quest system, dragon claws 100% runescape hits, better used quest tab.[/b][/size]
[size=18pt]Skype: runelord.support[/size]
[b]Clipped npc's and range stacking:[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/x3xSW.gif[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/iRJWV.gif[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/xteV8.gif[/img]
[b]UPDATE: New background! [/b]
[size=14pt][font=arial black]Update: X-LOG Fixed 100%
Update: Duping 100% removed.
Update: MySQL installed on server, gonna be packaging the server more.[/font][/size]
[b]Checkout my development teams post, or just pm me if you wanna beta test for information ;)[/b]
[size=18pt][b]Development Teams:[/b][/size]
[size=16pt][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,555988.0.html]Development Teams Post.[/url][/size][/ul]

item.title: RuneLord Alpha [Better combat system, custom minigame, clipped npcs and more++ ]
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

[quote=“Mark w, post:2, topic:453046”]This is great! good luck on this.

Offtopic: first post w00t[/quote]

Thanks… i guess

Soulcist:

Some new interesting stuff that could have potential if this continues, good luck with the development mate, I’ll eventually check back to see how it’s doing.

Thank you :), i’ve only been working on this for 10 days… but really appreciate it.

UPDATED

Read full topic
